title: ARIAT Men's Fr M5 Straight Duralight Stretch Basic Straight Leg Jean
description: CAT 2, Rated for dual-hazard flame resistant workwear helps protect against elecrical arcs
ATPV 14 cal/cm2, Rated to help protect from second degree burns when exposed to an electrical arc
NFPA 70E, Meets NFPA requirements for protection from possible exposure to workplace electrical discharge hazards
NFPA 2112, Meets NFPA requirements for protection from potential flash fire hazards in the workplace

Stay comfortable even when the environment isn't. Engineered with stretch to fit your body, these are the best FR jeans you'll ever wear. The most durable protection at the lightest weight, this pair is fitted through the hip and thigh with a narrow cut and straight leg.
